message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact details, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm confident you'll find it equally valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.  This is a chance to acquire something truly special.  Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss further.
